mutants.original_line: valid_strings = [string for string in array if string.isalpha() and any(char.isupper() for char in string) and any(char.islower() for char in string)]
mutants.mutated_line: valid_strings = [string for string in array if string.isalpha() or any((char.isupper() for char in string)) or any((char.islower() for char in string))]
